children.html:
Online reviews are paramount to the network economy which is based on informal exchanges between individuals and businesses.
        They provide a measure of trust in a world of dematerialized, and fluid interactions.
        Trustpilot is one of the many tech-companies trying to profit from this new market. 
        Trustpilot offers a platform for other websites 
        to outsource their review systems, therefore making these much easier than before to implement.
Read reviews. Write reviews. Find companies.

title: Trustpilot - Behind every review is an experience that matters
